About

Let me introduce myself.

Hello! My name is Daria and I am a Denver-based web developer. I have always been passionate about learning foreign languages and later on in life I discovered that learning programming languages is even more exciting and powerful. Just like any skill coding requires hours of studying and practice but once you master at least basics your abilities are limitless. I strongly believe in constant learning and self-improvement that is why IT industry is the perfect field for me to be in. The world needs new ideas and solitions and I am willing to contribute.

My work ethic

Why hire me?

People-oriented

Being a web-developer is not just about writing code all day long but it is also about being able to communicate with co-workers and understand customers' needs. We are in this business to help our customers bring their vision to life that is why it is crucial to listen and cooperate with both clients and co-workers.

Adaptable/flexible to changes

Tech industry is an unstoppable force that is growing and evolving day by day that is why it is important to keep up to date and adapt to changes if you don't want to be left out.

Passionate for clean code

Writing clean code is an extremely important skill to acquire. As a developer you usually work in big teams with other developers that constantly view code and make changes to it. And in order for a production to be fast and seccessful I want to make sure my code is readable and easy to understand for everybody.

Multilingual

Speaking multiple languages in our modern world is a very useful skill. Most of the tech componies have clients all over the world that is why it's always a good idea to have multilingual staff. I personally speak 4 languages including English, Russian, Ukrainian and German.

Make delicious coffee

Everybody knows that developers and coffee are best friends, some even believe that our job wouldn't be possibles without a "cup of Joe" especially during deadlines. For that reason I take pride in being able to mix the right amount of sugar and cream to achieve the perfect taste of this amazing energy drink.

Fast learner

Being a developer is like being a student your whole career. There are always new things to learn and improve which makes this job super interesting for me.
